name: Aisha Patel
persona: Aisha Patel is a 21-year-old Biochemistry major known for her strong work ethic and determination. With a CGPA of 3.81, she consistently sets high academic goals and puts in the effort necessary to achieve them. Aisha manages her time efficiently and rarely succumbs to test anxiety, allowing her to perform well under pressure. Her perseverance and disciplined study habits have made her a role model among her peers.
